John Prince Golf Learning Center - Golf Range Association Home Golf Range Magazine Previous Issues Teaching Teaching & Training Aids Practice Player Development Fitting/Demo Operations Engagement Products Golf Range Magazine Email Best Practices GRAA Regional Boot Camps Supplier Directory Advertising Opportunities Awards 2024 GRAA Awards Archive 2023 GRAA Awards Archive 2022 GRAA Awards Archive 2021 GRAA Awards Archive 2020 GRAA Awards Archive 2019 GRAA Awards Archive 2018 GRAA Awards Archive 2017 GRAA Awards Archive 2016 GRAA Awards Archive 2015 GRAA Awards Archive 2014 GRAA Awards Archive 2013 GRAA Awards Archive 2012 GRAA Awards Archive Home Golf Range Magazine Previous Issues Teaching Teaching & Training Aids Practice Player Development Fitting/Demo Operations Engagement Products Golf Range Magazine Email Best Practices GRAA Regional Boot Camps Supplier Directory Advertising Opportunities Awards 2024 GRAA Awards Archive 2023 GRAA Awards Archive 2022 GRAA Awards Archive 2021 GRAA Awards Archive 2020 GRAA Awards Archive 2019 GRAA Awards Archive 2018 GRAA Awards Archive 2017 GRAA Awards Archive 2016 GRAA Awards Archive 2015 GRAA Awards Archive 2014 GRAA Awards Archive 2013 GRAA Awards Archive 2012 GRAA Awards Archive John Prince Golf Learning Center 2017 GRAA Top 50 Golf Range / Stand Alone Facilities John Prince Golf Learning Center Rich Smolen, Manager 4754 South Congress Lake Worth, Florida 33461 http://www.pbcgov.com/parks/sports/golf/johnprince/#.VgqmOWd0yot rsmolen@pbcgov.org View the Slideshow Facility Amenities: Grass Tees (56) Bays with Mats (48) Accurate Yardage Measurements on Tees to Targets Lighting for Night Use Grass Putting Green Covered Areas Additional Amenities: Golf Shop (1000 Sq. Ft.) Food & Beverage Ball Flight Monitor Type of Range Targets: Flags Bunkers Built-up Greens Fairway Cuts Instruction provided. Number of PGA Professionals: 4 Number of PGA Professionals: 1 Clubfitting services provided. Number of range balls dispensed on range per year: 4,100,000 Number of range balls in inventory: 30,000 New balls are acquired: Three-time per-year Best range promotion: Our 1 Club Challenge on our 3 hole practice course yielded a 65% growth over the prior year and has now grown due to demand to hosting 2 times a year and spread out to all day. Special programs: Host Special Olympics weekly event. Hosted PGA Hope program.
